ygData.subject: Enjoy the Veterans Day break (off topic)
ygData.msgSnippet: Want to wish all you veterans out there a good Veterans Day weekend.  I for one am looking forward to the break.  Since I m in the US Army, I m off through
ygData.messageBody:
Want to wish all you veterans out there a good Veterans Day weekend. I for one
am looking forward to the break. Since I'm in the US Army, I'm off through
Monday. Combine that with my wife having to work(evil grin) and that means I
get to play EQ all day tomorrow and Friday. This will be the first time in a
long time I get to play for more than two hours at a time. Just might get the
chance to finally make 27th level and play around with the Charm song some.
Already printed out the song analysis that John Kim posted a few weeks back so I
have it to refer to. Got my song scroll already in my backpack and I'm even
gonna go ahead and make my pet hotkeys now in anticipation of gaining that song.


For you E'ci bards (Kitasi, Faras, Aloro, Laluni, et.al.), look me up if you are
online. Maybe we can all get together and work on getting quest components for
our armor. I'm getting tired of MM and was thinking about heading to Solusek.
An enchanter friend who is 35th level has already agreed to help me fight giants
in order to get some lambent stones as well.

Take care
Galtin of E'ci
